html:
July 22 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including ENI, Flutter Entertainment and Shell, on Thursday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Allianz SE ALVG.DE: Jefferies raises to buy from hold

* Alma Media Oyj ALMAC.HE: Inderes cuts to reduce from accumulate

* ENI ENI.MI: HSBC cuts to hold from buy

* Flutter Entertainment Plc FLTRF.L: RBC raises to outperform from sector perform

* Shell RDSa.L: HSBC cuts to hold from buy
